text: Flight Command is a 1940 American romantic drama movie directed by Frank Borzage and starring Robert Taylor, Ruth Hessey, Walter Pidgeon, Red Skelton, Nat Pendleton, Dick Purcell, Addison Richards, Marsha Hunt, Pat Flaherty. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1942. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1940 romance movies Category:1940 drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Borzage
title: Flight Command
